Row.Text: Radial Measuring Tool Unleashed[NEWLINE]Alt+4 to open/close the mod window[NEWLINE]Escape to close the mod window if opened
Click on the map to visually estimate tiles in radius
Alternate radius count. With this checkbox selected the radius in the dropdown list will match civilopedia descriptions: 'within X tiles'
Mark notable spots on the map (experimental)
Radial Measuring Tool will try to find the best settlement locations in the radius. This suggestions might differ from that ones the game gives and might not be optimal.
Color tiles in up to 8 radiuses
Disable intersects of multiple radiuses highligh colors
Disable dimming of tiles outside the radius
Color and calculate tiles in radius even if they are not discovered yet
Color on luxury or strategic resource tiles and ignore bonus and other resource tiles
Tiles count in active radius compared to previous radius (radius center #2)
This option maybe inappropriate for Network games and was moved to Unleashed version of the mod.
Some resources does not fit in this line and therefore was not shown.
Resource in range of another city
Tile in range of another city
Terrain yields in active radius compared to previous radius (radius center #2).[NEWLINE]Only yields on tiles that are not owned by other cities are counted.

Active radius resource availability compared to previous radius (radius center #2).[NEWLINE]Only resources on tiles that are not owned by other cities are counted.[NEWLINE]Duplicate resources are ignored.[NEWLINE]Prefixes:[NEWLINE]' ' - resource available in both radiuses;[NEWLINE]'[COLOR_GREEN]+[ENDCOLOR]' - resource is available only in active radius;[NEWLINE]'[COLOR_RED]-[ENDCOLOR]' - resource is available only in previous radius. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{1_res}

Previous radius center location #{1_radIdx}[NEWLINE]{2_YieldsTT}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{3_ResTT}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Left mouse button click to activate this radius. [NEWLINE]Right mouse button click to remove this radius
Mod Radial Measuring Tool estimated this location as one of the notable locations in the radius... [NEWLINE]Estimated location value:
